title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, May 4, 2022
description: On this day in 1675, England’s King Charles II commissioned the Royal Greenwich Observatory and appointed the position of Astronomer Royal.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1675, England’s King Charles II commissioned the Royal Greenwich Observatory and appointed the position of Astronomer Royal.
itunes:summary: On this day in 1675, England’s King Charles II commissioned the Royal Greenwich Observatory and appointed the position of Astronomer Royal.
